raw_body: SELVADURAI,​ E. S. WIMAL – (Formerly of LICC,​ a Venture of the Hirdaramani Group) Beloved husband of Annette and loving father of Angelo,​ son of late Wigna and Grace Selvadurai,​ son-in-law of Mary and late Selladurai Navamani,​ brother of late Wiji,​ and of Jayo,​ Ranju and of late Kumar,​ brother-in-law of Therese and Sujeeva,​ Sherine,​ Dayan and Marie,​ Kamini,​ Liz and Kumari,​ called to Eternal Repose with our Lord Jesus Christ. Wimal leaves behind a large coterie of friends and relatives. Remains will lie at A. F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 10.00 a.m. on Tuesday,​ 27th February 2024. Funeral Service will take place at 3.30 p.m. at the Parlour and Interment at General Cemetery Kanatte,​ (R.C. Section),​ Borella.013763
